name: Galacto Force
description:
This is an early test for a 2D shooter game made as a two week individual Unity scripting assignment, but turned into a completely different beast, at Future Games Education in Stockholm.

The Galacto Force are at it again.  Enter a lone cadet who has to do the dirty work of raiding and cleaning up on this planet, laying the groundwork for the colonization force.

Get points by ridding yourself of these "good" deeds at the Galacto Force space frigate bar...

  • Fly your space ship and land on Galacto Force Frigate
  • Destructable Objects 
  • BAM! Particles!
  • Bomb and shoot the hell out of these poor little aliens
  • BOOM! Green Gooey Blood!
  • Nice soothing epic orchestral music
  • KERBLOOEY! Shady!

Will you take out all of the enemy "installments"?

GFX/Music/Scripting by Max Robert Studios(that's me)

Future Games 2020
